title: "Two Pigs on Seesaw (or What Oh She Bumps)" still bank
marks:
Inscriptions

on back, stamped: [MADE / IN / GER
description: ceramic bank with 2 pigs--one bigger--one smaller, balancing on a teeter-totter which is balanced on a sack; sack is green and gold; pigs are light orange with with darker ears; coin slot at front top of sack between 2 flowers; on the front of the sack, incised and filled with gold is, \"What oh she bumps.  500,000\"
